resources.string:
Bhimtal Lake is one of the largest Natural Lakes in India, located in the town of Bhimtal in the state of Uttarakhand.

 This lake is known to be the largest in terms of surface area in the Kumaon region and is a gorgeous sight for tourists.

 The island in the middle of the lake has been promoted as a major tourist attraction and is equipped with an aquarium showcasing the aquatic life of the region.
